title: Hutchinson names new director to Arkansas parks department
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Hutchinson names new director to Arkansas parks department Gov. Asa Hutchinson has named one of his senior advisers to serve as the next executive director of the Arkansas Department of Parks and Tourism. Post to Facebook Hutchinson names new director to Arkansas parks department Gov. Asa Hutchinson has named one of his senior advisers to serve as the next executive director of the Arkansas Department of Parks and Tourism.  //on.kthv.com/1LORUTI   Join the Conversation To   Hutchinson names new director to Arkansas parks department Associated Press, news source 10:56 a.m. CDT October 22, 2015 9. Monticello CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (AP) - Gov. Asa Hutchinson has named one of his senior advisers to serve as the next executive director of the Arkansas Department of Parks and Tourism. Hutchinson announced Thursday that Kane Webb would serve as the agency's director. The Parks, Recreation and Travel Commission confirmed Hutchinson's recommendation in a vote Thursday morning. Webb is a longtime journalist who joined the governor's administration shortly after Hutchinson was elected. He has worked as Hutchinson's senior adviser and served as a communications aide. Webb replaces Richard Davies, who is retiring this year after serving 25 years as the agency's executive director.
